code: import axios from"axios";import{useCallback,useState}from"react";import{useMessage}from"./useMessage";export const useAllEmployees=()=>{const{showMessage}=useMessage();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[employees,setEmployees]=useState([]);const getEmployees=useCallback(async()=>{console.log("社員リスト取得開始");setLoading(true);await axios.get("/api/employeeList").then(res=>{setEmployees(res.data);}).catch(e=>{console.log(e);showMessage({title:"社員情報の取得に失敗しました",status:"error"});}).finally(()=>{setLoading(false);});},[]);return{getEmployees,employees,loading};};
